messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: anneo/ the message board
messages.msgSnippet: **What s up w/the unschooling.com message boards,** I don t think they know.  I think they had to get an outside computer fixing source in to look at the
messages.messageBody:
**What's up w/the unschooling.com message boards,**



I don't think they know. I think they had to get an outside computer fixing source in to look at the problem.



Can you tell that I'm such a computer techie, NOT! <G>



I miss is too, I don't post much, just too busy with everything else, but I read pretty much every day.



Kelli~

<kellitraas@y...> wrote:
> <<deep dark voice>> " Come over to the discussion list side
Anne,,,, It's your destiny.."

LOL! Well, it worked, though!

What's up w/the unschooling.com message boards, anyway (sorry if it's
been discussed already!)?

~ Anne

> If I'd known that all it would take to get Anne here would be to
knock down
> the unschooling.com message boards, I would have done that a
loooong time ago!
> <G>

NOOOOOOO!!

Actually, I'm kinda likin' it here (reading the messages from the
site, that is)! And I was needing to connect with some pre-
conference-excitement-posts, so it's serving my needs perfectly
(silly me was thinking the pre-conference-excitement-posts would be
on the conference list!)!

~ Anne
